text_en: This work is about those who carry heavy loads on their shoulders and cross borders. They are killed every day. We call them Kolbar.

tweet_text: @edpalmeruk Yes. We have a pan like this too; I call it ‘The University Pan’. It’s the one your parents sent you off with and the melted plastic handle happened when you were making corned beef hash at 3:00am after a night out. I say 9/10 just for all it’s been through with you.
